See also: jacke and jacké

German[edit]

Etymology[edit]

From Old French jaque.

Pronunciation[edit]

  • IPA(key): /ˈjakə/
  • audio
    		(file)

Noun[edit]

Jacke f (genitive Jacke, plural Jacken, diminutive Jäckchen n)

  1. jacket

Swedish[edit]

Pronunciation[edit]

  • IPA(key): /²jakɛ/

Proper noun[edit]

Jacke c (genitive Jackes)

  1. A diminutive of the male given names Jakob or Jacob.
